channel.title: Runescape loading problem!
channel.description:
hi, i just tried playing runescape and got to the loading screen and is started loading but when it got to the connecting to update server... it stayed there for like 5 mins then i got this screen come up!!
[i][b][Error_game_js5connect - Unable to connect to update server. Runescape was unable to connect to the update server. This is most likely caused by a firewall blocking the connection. To resolve this:
If you have firewall or security software installed please ensure RuneScape/Java is allowed to open outgoing network connections on ports 43594.
Note Windows XP Service Pack 2 has built in firewall software. If when loading RuneScape this asks if you want to allow the connection, you need to say 'yes'.
If that doesn't help then an external firewall may be causing the problem. Please ask your network adminstrator/ISP to open port 43594 for TCP traffic.
If problems persist then please refer to our technical FAQ which can be found in the FAQ section of our website.[/b][/i]
i havnt changed any settings with my firewall!!
please help me out here thanx

item.title: Runescape loading problem!
item.dc:creator: @Dukly Dukly
item.description:
@Dukly wrote:

Try making a call to your ISP like it says, and ask the techs there to do it. but it could always just be your java cache being stupid, so i suggest clearing ALL cache, cookies, and history, then try again… and by ALL cache i mean temp internet files, java cache(easy to find if you know where java is installed to), and the rest of your computers cache, mine came up with the same message like 2 weeks ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape loading problem!
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

  1. play under ur pc’s admin acount…
  2. click yes on the java window in the begainin…
    3)turn off your firewall…
    4)do all above at once…

Read full topic

hi, i just tried playing runescape and got to the loading screen and is started loading but when it got to the connecting to update server… it stayed there for like 5 mins then i got this screen come up!!

[i][b][Error_game_js5connect - Unable to connect to update server.
Runescape was unable to connect to the update server. This is most likely caused by a firewall blocking the connection. To resolve this:

If that doesn’t help then an external firewall may be causing the problem. Please ask your network adminstrator/ISP to open port 43594 for TCP traffic.
